data.marketing-about-we-are-cards: andCards is how people work anywhere
data.marketing-about-us-text: At andCards we believe that there is a better way to do work. Spending years working in the same office with the same people may be boring. We are extremely passionate about this and our goal is to help people achieve it. The is an unlimited about of amazing places and people around the world and we want to help people take advantage and experience this.
